title: Horse in the House
description: With sales of more than 3 million books, this newest Animal Ark title will provide cozy reading for young animal lovers.Mandy and James are sad that their friend Wilfred Bennett has to sell his riding stables. Things get even worse when Sam Western turns the land into a campsite and wants everyone to forget that the stables ever existed. Now campers are telling stories of a ghostly horse and rider passing through the campsite - and vanishing into the night air! Mandy and James don't believe the spooky tales, but can they figure out what's really going on?
author: Ben M. Baglio
